content.rendered:
Shape Maker on MakerBot PrintShop makes it easy and fast to transform your sketches, photos, and screen captures into a 3D printable file.

Download today at MakerBot.com/PrintShop

excerpt.rendered: Shape Maker on MakerBot PrintShop makes it easy and fast to transform your sketches, photos, and screen captures into a 3D printable file. Download today at MakerBot.com/PrintShop
